titles.ar: باب فِيمَنْ زُوِّجَ ثُمَّ جَاءَ نَعْيُهُ
titles.en: Chapter 72 – Regarding the one who gets married, then comes his news of death

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَفْجُرُ بِالْمَرْأَةِ فَيَتَزَوَّجُ أُمَّهَا أَوِ ابْنَتَهَا أَوْ يَفْجُرُ بِأُمِّ امْرَأَتِهِ أَوِ ابْنَتِهَا
titles.en: Chapter 73 – The man is immoral with the woman, so he marries her mother, or her daughter, or he is immoral with a mother of his wife, or her daughter
Chapter 71 – The marriage with the wages

titles.ar: باب فِيمَنْ زُوِّجَ ثُمَّ جَاءَ نَعْيُهُ
titles.en: Chapter 72 – Regarding the one who gets married, then comes his news of death

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مرسل - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (0/167)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ بُكَيْرٍ عَنْ بَعْضِ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي

text: رَجُلٍ أَرْسَلَ يَخْطُبُ إِلَيْهِ امْرَأَةً وَ هُوَ غَائِبٌ فَأَنْكَحُوا الْغَائِبَ وَ فُرِضَ الصَّدَاقُ ثُمَّ جَاءَ خَبَرُهُ بَعْدُ أَنَّهُ تُوُفِّيَ بَعْدَ مَا سَبَقَ الصَّدَاقُ فَقَالَ إِنْ كَانَ أُمْلِكَ بَعْدَ مَا تُوُفِّيَ فَلَيْسَ لَهَا صَدَاقٌ وَ لَا مِيرَاثٌ وَ إِنْ كَانَ أُمْلِكَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يُتَوَفَّى فَلَهَا نِصْفُ الصَّدَاقِ وَ هِيَ وَارِثُهُ وَ عَلَيْهَا الْعِدَّةُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Ali, from Abdullah Bin Bukeyr, from one of our companions,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> regarding a man who sent a proposal of his to a woman, and he was absent. So he married her in absence, and necessitated the dower. Then came the news of his death afterwards that he had died, after the dower had been sent. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘If the possession is after his death, so there is no dower for her, nor an inheritance, but if it was such that the possession was before his death, so for her would be half the dower, and she would inherit him, and upon her is the waiting period’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from al-Hassan ibn Ali from ‘Abd Allah ibn Bukayr from certain persons of our people who has said the following: “About the case of a man who sends a proposal for marriage and he is absent. They give her in marriage to one who is absent and assign mahr (dower) but then news comes that he is dead after assigning mahr (dower). He (the Imam) said, Tf his earning is after his death she has no mahr (dower) or inheritance but if his earning is before his death then she deserves half of mahr (dower) and she inherits him.”’
